name: Attr
description: The Attr interface represents one of a DOM element's attributes as an object. In most DOM methods, you will directly retrieve the attribute as a string (e.g., Element.getAttribute()), but certain functions (e.g., Element.getAttributeNode()) or means of iterating return Attr types.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Core Specification
refs.description: Attr - Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Core Specification
